#summary How to set up a development environment.
#labels Featured,Development,Phase-Implementation

=Introduction=
IAML is primarly developed in the Eclipse environment, and heavily based on many of its sub projects. It is based on Eclipse 3.3/GMF 2.0.2 until [https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/buglist.cgi?email1=jevon%40jevon.org&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&emailreporter1=1 some bugs are fixed] or we find workarounds.

=Requirements=

  # [http://archive.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-3.3.2-200802211800/index.php Eclipse 3.3 SDK Europa]
  # Java 1.6

Through the *Europa update site:*

  # Graphical Editors > Graphical Editing Framework SDK 3.3.2
  # Models > Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) Extender SDK 2.3.2
  # Models > Graphical Modeling Framework 2.0.2
  # Models > UML2 End-User Features
  # + all required features

*[http://www.eclipse.org/modeling/gmf/ GMF]:*
  # Download the [http://www.eclipse.org/modeling/download.php?file=/modeling/gmf/gmf/downloads/drops/2.0.2/R200802250200/GMF-sdk-2.0.2.zip GMF SDK 2.0.2] (the [http://download.eclipse.org/modeling/gmf/updates/releases/ update site] doesn't include the full source) and extract into your Eclipse directory

If you also wish to install the components necessary for profiling the project, install the following additional components from the *Europa update site:*

  # Testing and Performance > TPTP Platform Project 4.4.100
  # Testing and Performance > TPTP Testing Tools Project 43.200
  # Testing and Performance > TPTP Tracing and Profiling Tools Project 4.3.100
  # + all required features
